性転換手術: (せいてんかんしゅじゅつ) - sex change surgery
性風俗: (せいふうぞく) - sexual culture; sexual mores
性風俗店: (せいふうぞくてん) - adult entertainment shop; sex shop
性風俗産業: (せいふうぞくさんぎょう) - sex entertainment industry
性風俗関連特殊営業: (せいふうぞくかんれんとくしゅえいぎょう) - sex establishment (as regulated by a specific Japanese law)
怨ずる: (えんずる) - to bear a grudge
怨み: (うらみ) - resentment/grudge/malice/bitterness; (esp. 憾み) matter for regret/regret
怨みつらみ: (うらみつらみ) - pent-up resentment; grudges and hard feelings
怨みを買う: (うらみをかう) - to incur someone's enmity
怨み節: (うらみぶし) - song with lyrics about resentment and a sorrowful tune; resentful complaint
怨み辛み: (うらみつらみ) - pent-up resentment; grudges and hard feelings
怨む: (うらむ) - to resent/to curse/to feel bitter/to blame/to bear a grudge; (esp. 憾む) to regret
怨憎会苦: (おんぞうえく) - (yoji)  the pain of meeting people one dislikes
怨敵退散: (おんてきたいさん) - (yoji) invoking disaster upon one's mortal enemy; Confusion to the enemy!
怪しい: (ayashii) - suspicious, dubious, doubtful, dodgy, suspicious (referring to a potential amorous relation), dangerous (por exemplo, situação financeira), ominous (e.g. weather), strange, shady, fishy; charming, bewitching, mysterious
怪しい手付きで: (あやしいてつきで) - clumsily; with clumsy hands
怪中の怪: (かいちゅうのかい) - mystery of mysteries
怪事: (かいじ) - mystery; strange event; mysterious affair
怪傑: (かいけつ) - man of extraordinary talent; wonder man
怪力乱神: (かいりきらんしん) - (yoji) supernatural things; unnatural phenomena; spirits and demons
怪力無双: (かいりきむそう) - (yoji) (a person of) unrivaled physical strength
怪奇: (かいき) - bizarre; strange; wonderful; weird; outrageous
怪奇小説: (かいきしょうせつ) - mystery novel
怪奇物語り: (かいきものがたり) - mystery story
怪情報: (かいじょうほう) - gossip; rumor; rumour
怪我の功名: (けがのこうみょう) - fortunate error; lucky break; fluke
怪木: (かいぼく) - strange tree; mysterious tree
怪気炎をあげる: (かいきえんをあげる) - to speak flamboyantly
怪気炎を上げる: (かいきえんをあげる) - to speak flamboyantly
怪演: (かいえん) - eerie yet strangely fascinating performance
怪火: (かいか) - fire of suspicious origin/suspected arson/mysterious fire; will-o'-the-wisp
怪猫: (かいびょう) - monster cat; cat with magical powers
怪獣映画: (かいじゅうえいが) - monster film
怪石: (かいせき) - oddly shaped stone; oddly shaped rock
怪童: (かいどう) - unusually large or strong youth
怪聞: (かいぶん) - strange rumor; strange rumour; scandal
怪腕: (かいわん) - remarkable ability; amazing ability
怪雨: (かいう) - rainfall of a strange, dark color (colour); whirlwinds accompanied by rain which also drops strange objects such as fish
怪魚: (かいぎょ) - mysterious fish; strange fish
怪鳥: (かいちょう) - suspicious bird; strange bird; eerie bird; ominous bird; apparition transformed into a bird
怪鳥音: (かいちょうおん) - call of a strange bird; strange bird-call-like sound
怪鴟: (ヨタカ) - grey nightjar (Caprimulgus indicus); nightjar (any bird of family Caprimulgidae)/goatsucker; (夜鷹 only) streetwalker/low class prostitute (Edo period); (夜鷹 only)   soba vendors who walk around at night/soba sold by these vendors
怯え: (おびえ) - being startled, surprised or afraid; panic; trepidation
怯える: (おびえる) - to become frightened; to be frightened (of); to be scared (of)
怯む: (ひるむ) - to falter; to flinch (from); to recoil (from); to quail (at)
怱々: (そうそう) - busy/hurried/rushed; (letters ending with this start with 前略, 冠省, etc.)  Yours Sincerely/Yours in haste
怱卒: (そうそつ) - sudden; hurried; busy; precipitate; abrupt
怱忙として: (そうぼうとして) - in great haste; hurriedly; in a hurry
怱怱: (そうそう) - busy/hurried/rushed; (letters ending with this start with 前略, 冠省, etc.)  Yours Sincerely/Yours in haste
恃む: (たのむ) - to request/to beg/to ask; to call/to order/to reserve; to entrust to; (esp. 恃む) to rely on
